synopsis.text:
This anime is a captivating collection of short, dialogue-free animations that explore various facets of contemporary society, set to the rhythm of Mussorgsky's 'Pictures at an Exhibition' Suite. Each segment delves into the lives of distinct characters, such as a fashion enthusiast, a plastic surgeon, and a gossip-loving individual, offering a unique perspective on societal progress.

The anime also presents an art exhibition filled with stunning paintings, each narrating an intriguing tale. From an elephant's unlikely journey to becoming a boxing champion to a man's chilling experience of being replaced by a robot in his own factory, these paintings cover a wide array of captivating stories. Even a serene Zen master's unwavering calm amidst chaos finds a place on these canvas walls.

In essence, this anime is a visual symphony that combines the allure of classical music with thought-provoking narratives, promising an immersive and enlightening viewing experience.
